title: Whisper Who Dares
description: An action-packed, nerve-biting inside account of a crack SAS team sent to cut the jugular of the IRA...DATELINE: ULSTER '76The British government is worried. The new monster in the IRA's armoury must be destroyed at birth. A top-secret, top-priority order goes out to 22 Special Air Service Regiment:SEEK AND DESTROY - NO MATTER WHERE.For the four-men Sabre team of the legendary SAS this will be their toughest mission... probing the inner sanctum of the IRA's terror machine, fighting in the bloody carnage and chaos of Ulster - never before has so much been at stake. They encounter both triumph and disaster - and the cruellest twist of fate.
author: Terence Strong
